author: Dr. Nancy A. Anoruo
title: What to know about coronavirus and swimming
description: Doctors weigh in on the risks of contracting the new coronavirus through swimming in water.
content: With the weather warming up and states like Florida announcing plans to reopen beaches, thoughts of beach vacations and weekends at the lake are bubbling up -- and so is the question about whether it's safe to go swimming without contracting the new coronavir… [+4312 chars]
